special_text:
The “legend rule” doesn't apply to permanents you control.
[+2]: Add {C} for each legendary permanent you control. This mana can't be spent to cast nonlegendary spells from your hand.
[+2]: Discard a card. Draw a card.
[-3]: You may play a permanent card from your graveyard this turn. Legendary spells cast this way can't be countered.
